value.title: Facebook rules allowing fake Biden “pedophile” video deemed “incoherent”
value.excerpt: A fake video manipulated to falsely depict President Joe Biden inappropriately touching his granddaughter has revealed flaws in Facebook's "deepfake" policies, Meta's Oversight Board concluded Monday.

value.title: A baby llama has possibly been stolen from Maine farm
value.excerpt: Mainers should be on the lookout for a baby llama that was possibly stolen from a farm in Acton. Acton Animal Control Officer Jim Driscoll was notified Sunday about a possibly stolen llama. He is asking farmers and neighbors in the area of Foxes Ridge and County roads to look out for the animal.

value.title: Meta Platforms to deploy in-house custom chips this year to power AI drive: internal memo

value.title: Meta Released a Specialized version of Llama 2 for Code Generation
value.excerpt: Based on the open-source Llama 2, one of the largest LLMs in the world, with 175 billion parameters, Code Llama is a collection of pre-trained and fine-tuned generative text models ranging in scale from 7 billion to 70 billion parameters.

value.title: Google Suddenly Reveals Huge Free AI Upgrade For All Android Users
value.excerpt: Google has spent two-years pushing its Messages app as the default Android alternative to iMessage. This has included end-to-end encryption and RCS by default, and multiple feature releases. Now, with that done, here comes an AI upgrade that connects Messages users with Google, not just with one another.

value.title: Fixing AI made easy: RagaAI emerges from stealth with automated testing solution

value.excerpt: Think through the path. Google has spent two-years pushing its Messages app as the default Android alternative to iMessage.
